@ParametersAreNonnullByDefault

Package edu.hm.hafner.util

Provides highly reusable utility classes and static methods, chiefly concerned with adding value to java.lang and other standard core classes.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
IPropertyChangeAware Instances of this interface are capable of sending PropertyChangeEvent events to attached listeners.
 

Class Summary
Ensure Provides several helper methods to validate method arguments and class invariants thus supporting the design by contract concept (DBC).
Ensure.ArrayCondition Assertions for iterables.
Ensure.BooleanCondition Assertions for booleans.
Ensure.ExceptionCondition Assertions for exceptions.
Ensure.IterableCondition Assertions for iterables.
Ensure.ObjectCondition Assertions for objects.
Ensure.StringCondition Assertions for strings.
EnsureTest Tests the class Ensure.
EuroConverter Konvertiert Geldbetr√§ge nach Euro.
EuroConverterTest Testet die Klasse EuroConverter.
PropertyChangeAware Utility class that can be used as base class for beans that support bound properties.
PropertyChangeAwareTest Tests the class PropertyChangeAware.
Singleton Provides a simple access to the element of a singleton collection.
SingletonTest Tests the class Singleton.
StringUtils Several useful utility methods that work on String instances.
StringUtilsTest Testet die Klasse StringUtils.
 

Exception Summary
AssertionFailedException Thrown to indicate that a contract assertion check has been failed.
 

Package edu.hm.hafner.util Description

Provides highly reusable utility classes and static methods, chiefly concerned with adding value to java.lang and other standard core classes.
